All gifts from selected category will be moved to this new one

All gifts from this category will be moved to "Other" category

age.help: How long in days, new gifts will be marked as new. After being older than set days, they will be marked as just gifts. Calming or realising gifts overrides this

Input font awesome class name.
For example fa-google for google icon.Fore more info about available fontawesome icons please go to http://fontawesome.io/

Select which search engines should be shown next to this gift.
Everyone will be able to quickly search using them by just clicking that icon

unclaim.error: You cannot remove claim on gift you have not previously claimed

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete?

step.1: Welcome to GIfts Hub</br>Place where you can share your wish list with your friends and family</br>This short guide will show you basic functions of application and show you how to add gifts, families and share your list
step.10:
User
Here user which gifts are currently shown. If that user is part of family, we can quickly switch to other family members.
step.12:
Sorting
How users are sorted - alphabetical or grouped in families.

Default sorting can be set by application administrator
step.13:
Create/edit family
One of main application functionalities is grouping users in families.
Thanks to this , we can browse gifts quicker and manage them faster by family administrators
step.14: When creating family you can name it with custom name (if left empty , your surname will be used), and you can add other application users that are not yet part of family.</br></br>You can also designate family administrator, who will be able to add and edit other family members gifts list.
step.15: After creating family we will be able to create kid account by clicking  Add kid button
step.16: Kid account is a special type of account, which cannot be logged into. Only family administrator will be able to add and edit gifts to this account.</br></br>While creating new kid account please set name and surname, unique login ( application will check if it is free) and optional avatar
step.17:
Account settings
Your account settings are in menu under your avatar
step.18: On this screen you can set your custom avatar, change application display language and define if your list can be public
step.19: Most of information are on help page. There you can also reset tutorial and start it from beginning.
step.2:
Wish list
Here is your wish list, page where you can add, browse and edit your list
step.3:
To add new gift, click Add newbutton on wish list view

If you are family administrator, you can add gifts on wish list of other family members
step.4:
While creating new gift, only name field is required.
When adding gift, try to make it as a keyword, which will be used by search engines.

Other fields are optional but helpfull.

It's good to add new gift to category, and select which search engines will be visible for it

Please create now new gift (do not worry , you can delete it afterwards), so that tutorial will be able to show you more information about gifts
step.5: It is also possible to import many gifts at once. Start by clicking button
step.6: Select previously filled in excel file (created based on downloaded template), and click Import</br></br>All valid gifts from file will be imported for current user</br>(or family member, which gifts were currently browsed)
step.7: All gifts are grouped in categories and sorted by date. Newest gifts at top, old at the bottom.</br></br>Claimed gifts are additionally colored in orange with information who claimed on mouse over on claimed icon</br>(gift owner will not see this information).</br>Claimed gifts are shown at the bottom in their category
step.8:
Gift link
If link was created during gift creation, you can open it from here
step.9:
Actions
Here are all actions available for gift. Depending if you are on your list or other users list, different actions are available.

- Mark gift as realised
- Edit gift
- Delete gift
- claim gift ( or remove claim)
step.filter:
Filtering
Click here to filter by category.
When clicked, extra dropdown will be shown where you can either type or choose one of existing categories.
When there is active filter, icon will be changed to
step.final:
This concludes this short tutorial.
I hope that you will enjoy using this application.

In case of any bugs or ideas, You can always try to contact me under my email:
jakub.romaniszyn@gmail.com

public.help:
When selected, anyone accessing your public url will be able to see gifts, without need of creating account.
Anonymous users however cannot see claimed status or claim gifts.
